text:

 Do not use maternal facial oxygen therapy for intrauterine fetal resuscitation, because it may
harm the baby (but it can be used where it is administered for maternal indications such as
hypoxia or as part of preoxygenation before a potential anaesthetic)
 Do not offer amnioinfusion for intrauterine fetal resuscitation.
o Salbutamol bolus dose (see algorithms below): 250 mcg IV, slowly over 2 minutes.
